text: Paraperonia is a genus of air-breathing sea slugs, a shell-less marine pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Onchidiidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Paraperonia include: * Paraperonia fidjiensis Labbé, 1934 * Paraperonia gondwanae Labbé, 1934 * Paraperonia jousseaumei Labbé, 1934 * Paraperonia madagascariensis Labbé, 1934 ==References== Category:Onchidiidae
title: Paraperonia
